author: hustla187
title: impressive
review: This is a good set for your money. It comes with one minifig, a tree, and supplies. If you got more of these, you could have your own street sweeping business( the old skool way ). Definitely a must own for any Lego town fan.

author: shenron
title: Diminutive addition
review:
When looking at a diminutive set such as this, it has to be put in the right perspective: the main reason for these sets are to add a minifigure to your town. As long as the minifig is cool and some a couple of interesting accessories, the set has served its purpose.

This one goes beyond.

The minifig is simple but cool enough, with a hard to find blue cap (there were no blue caps for 20 years until some 2002 train sets) and with a men-at-work vest.
The cart is really simple, but with only 6 pieces it has handles, wheels and leg, and makes a clever use of low fences. If it had two hooks for the spade and broom it would have won an Oscar.
As a totally unneeded extra, a tree is included.

Overall this little set has immediate playability, good economic design, and very decent look.

author: maxtimebuster
title: A small upgrade to keep your town clean.
review:
A classic town minifig garnished with a tree.

Pros

  • - useful attachements
  • - rare safety jacket

Cons

  • - awful barrow
Of course nothing you have to buy, but truly something helpul.
